evidence.claim: Cloudbreak Health utilizes AWS for its infrastructure.
The platform is compliant with HIPAA and supports various health data standards including HL7 and FHIR.
Cloudbreak Health mentions integration with EHRs through standards like X12 and HL7.
Developers can access documentation on how to use APIs in the health tech domain including FHIR features.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in healthcare data exchange with strong HIPAA & X12 focus.
